message: This is a fair first offer, Bob. I'm sure we can work something out.
I'll give you a small share, but I'm not giving up much.
This is a fair compromise. I've lowered my offer to meet you halfway, and I think it's in both of our best interests to end this game now.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to give up control.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to take a smaller share to end this, but I can't go lower.  Let's settle this before things get even worse for both of us.
